edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff
Class TextLine

java.lang.Object
  edu.uga.cs1302.txtbuff.TextLine
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditableTextLine
public class TextLine
extends java.lang.Object

TextLine class holds all the methods related to the text line, _TextLine.

Field Summary
protected  char[] _TempTextLine
          _TempTextLine is used to hold a copy of _TextLine to allow for _TextLine to be resized and easily reinitialized.
protected  char[] _TextLine
          _TextLine holds the array of characters.
 int capacitySize
          capacitySize holds the capacity size for _TextLine.
 int DEFAULT_SIZE
          DEFAULT_SIZE is used to control the capacity size of _TextLine.
 int stringLength
          stringLength holds the length of the string in _TextLine.
protected  int tempStringLength
          tempStringLength is used to hold the original string length during a resize process, and also is used to determine if a resize is needed.
 
Constructor Summary
TextLine()
          TextLine constructor initializes the variables stringLength to 0, capacitySize to DEFAULT_SIZE (80), and creates a new character array of DEFAULT_SIZE, _TextLine.
TextLine(java.lang.String line)
          TextLine(String line) constructor initalizes each character in the string line to a new character array _TextLine It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages
 
Method Summary
 int capacity()
          capacity() returns the capacity size of the character array.
 int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment)
          indexOf(String fragment) determines if the string fragment is in the _TextLine starting at index 0.
 int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment, int fromIndex)
          indexOf(String fragment, int fromIdex) searches through the character array starting at index fromIndex for the string fragment.
 int length()
          length() returns the string length in the character array.
protected  void TextLineCopy()
          TextLineCopy() copies _TextLine to _TempTextLine during a resizing process It is protected so it can be accessed in other classes.
 void TextLineCopyBack()
          TextLineCopyBack() copies _TempTextLine to a new _TextLine and resizes if needed.
 java.lang.String toString()
          toString() is an overridden method that converts the character array _TextLine to a string and returns that string.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

DEFAULT_SIZE

public final int DEFAULT_SIZE
DEFAULT_SIZE is used to control the capacity size of _TextLine. It is public so it can be called from other classes.

Constant Field Values

_TextLine

protected char[] _TextLine
_TextLine holds the array of characters. It is protected so it can be called from other classes in this package.

_TempTextLine

protected char[] _TempTextLine
_TempTextLine is used to hold a copy of _TextLine to allow for _TextLine to be resized and easily reinitialized. It is protected so it can be called from other classes in this package.

capacitySize

public int capacitySize
capacitySize holds the capacity size for _TextLine. It is protected so it can be called from other classes in this package.

stringLength

public int stringLength
stringLength holds the length of the string in _TextLine. It is public so it can be called from other classes.

tempStringLength

protected int tempStringLength
tempStringLength is used to hold the original string length during a resize process, and also is used to determine if a resize is needed. It is protected so it can be called from other classes in this package.

Constructor Detail

TextLine

public TextLine()
TextLine constructor initializes the variables stringLength to 0, capacitySize to DEFAULT_SIZE (80), and creates a new character array of DEFAULT_SIZE, _TextLine. It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages

TextLine

public TextLine(java.lang.String line)
TextLine(String line) constructor initalizes each character in the string line to a new character array _TextLine It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages

Parameters:
line - the string that will be assigned to _TextLine
Method Detail

TextLineCopy

protected void TextLineCopy()
TextLineCopy() copies _TextLine to _TempTextLine during a resizing process It is protected so it can be accessed in other classes.

TextLineCopyBack

public void TextLineCopyBack()
TextLineCopyBack() copies _TempTextLine to a new _TextLine and resizes if needed. It is protected so it can be accessed in other classes.

indexOf

public int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment)
indexOf(String fragment) determines if the string fragment is in the _TextLine starting at index 0. It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages.

Parameters:
fragment - the fragment searching to find in _TextLine
Returns:
-1 is fragment not found, or index at which the fragment was found

indexOf

public int indexOf(java.lang.String fragment,
                   int fromIndex)
indexOf(String fragment, int fromIdex) searches through the character array starting at index fromIndex for the string fragment. If the fragment is found, the index at which it was found is returned, if the fragment was not found, then -1 is returned. It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages

Parameters:
fragment - string searched for in character array
fromIndex - index to start searching at
Returns:
returns -1 is fragment not found, or index at which the fragment was found

length

public int length()
length() returns the string length in the character array. It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages.

Returns:
this.stringLength

capacity

public int capacity()
capacity() returns the capacity size of the character array. It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages.

Returns:
this.capacitySize

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
toString() is an overridden method that converts the character array _TextLine to a string and returns that string. It is public so it can be accessed in other classes or packages.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
textLineString the converted string
